problems.title: Factorial Using Recursion
problems.description: Write a recursive function to calculate factorial of a number.

problems.title: Print N Natural Numbers
problems.description: Write a recursive function to print first n natural numbers.
problems.outputFormat: Print numbers from 1 to n, space-separated

problems.title: Sum of N Natural Numbers
problems.description: Write a recursive function to calculate sum of first n natural numbers.

problems.title: Power Function
problems.description: Write a recursive function to calculate x raised to power n.
problems.inputFormat: Two space-separated integers x and n

problems.title: Count Digits
problems.description: Write a recursive function to count the number of digits in a number.

problems.title: Sum of Digits
problems.description: Write a recursive function to find sum of digits of a number.

problems.title: Print Array Recursively
problems.description: Write a recursive function to print all elements of an array.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Reverse Print Array
problems.description: Write a recursive function to print array elements in reverse order.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Print Stars Pattern
problems.description: Write a recursive function to print n stars on a single line.

problems.description: Write a recursive function to find GCD of two numbers using Euclidean algorithm.
problems.inputFormat: Two space-separated integers a and b
